md:
giải nghĩa từ "podcasts" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Podcasts** (noun)

* Meaning: A series of digital audio files that are released on a regular schedule, such as weekly or monthly, and can be downloaded or streamed online.
* Vietnamese translation: Chương trình âm thanh số (or simply "Podcast")

Example sentence: "I love listening to podcasts on my commute to work."

Related words:

* **Episode** (noun): A single installment of a podcast. (e.g. "I just listened to the latest episode of my favorite podcast.")
* **Subscribe** (verb): To sign up to receive new episodes of a podcast automatically. (e.g. "I subscribed to the podcast so I don't miss any new episodes.")
* **Stream** (verb): To listen to a podcast online without downloading it. (e.g. "I like to stream podcasts while I'm working out.")
html:
giải nghĩa từ "podcasts" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Podcasts (noun)

  • Meaning: A series of digital audio files that are released on a regular schedule, such as weekly or monthly, and can be downloaded or streamed online.
  • Vietnamese translation: Chương trình âm thanh số (or simply "Podcast")

Example sentence: "I love listening to podcasts on my commute to work."

Related words:

  • Episode (noun): A single installment of a podcast. (e.g. "I just listened to the latest episode of my favorite podcast.")
  • Subscribe (verb): To sign up to receive new episodes of a podcast automatically. (e.g. "I subscribed to the podcast so I don't miss any new episodes.")
  • Stream (verb): To listen to a podcast online without downloading it. (e.g. "I like to stream podcasts while I'm working out.")
